channel.title: Projects on Cheng XU（徐 诚）
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Cheng XU（徐 诚）

item.description: This is supplementary video for the paper MatSwarm. v1-Introduction of MatSwarm: This video presents the backgrounds of the NMDMS platform, and introduces MatSwarm framework as a whole on its basis. This is supplementary video for the paper MatSwarm. v2-MatSwarm-procedures: This video details the procedures of swarm learning tasks based on MatSwarm. This is supplementary video for the paper MatSwarm. v3-MatSwarm-operations: This video demonstrates the practical operation process of federated tasks based on MatSwarm.
